header.title: Full interview with Gary Webb from July 1998

title: Full interview with Gary Webb from July 1998
content:
The late investigative journalist Gary Webb, subject of the new film Kill The Messenger, was the subject of persecution... <!--more--> from mainstream media when he published his groundbreaking report Dark Alliance detailing CIA awareness of contra drug trafficking.
In this interview Gary Webb and Gary Null discuss the details behind the media’s reaction to these controversial stories.
